name: Battle Banner
description: Every stand gets a +1 Attacks bonus during the unit's first combat engagement.

name: Banner of Shielding
description: Every stand gets a +1 Armor bonus to a peak of 3+. This effect lasts until a stand is lost.

name: Banner of Fortitude
description: Every stand gets a +1 Hits bonus during the unit's first combat engagement. Discard odd hits at the end of the combat engagement as the effect wears off.

name: Banner of Steadfastness
description: One shooting hit is ignored after saves have been made. This effect lasts until a stand is lost.

name: Banner of Fortune
description: The unit can re-roll all of its Attacks once per battle.

name: Sword of Destruction
description: One enemy unit must re-roll successful saves while in Combat with this unit.

name: Sword of Fate
description: One stand gets a +1 Attacks bonus during the unit's first combat engagement.

name: Sword of Cleaving
description: One unsuccessul Attack can be re-rolled each combat round.

name: Sword of Might
description: One stand gets +1 Attacks each combat round.

name: Crown of Command
description: The wearer's first order can be made on an unmodified Command value of 10. This effect lasts until an order made using this unmodified value is failed.

name: Helm of Dominion
description: For one turn only the wearer gets a +1 Command bonus to a maximum of 10. The player must announce that they are using this ability at the start of their turn.

name: Orb of Majesty
description: A single failed Command test can be re-rolled at a Command value of 8. The usual modifiers apply except that the re-roll counts as the first roll for the purposes of modifiers. If the re-roll is successful the wearer can continue issuing orders using their normal Command value.

name: Ring of Magic
description: One spell can be cast automatically once per battle.

name: Staff of Spellbinding
description: When an enemy Wizard casts a spell the wielder may roll a D6. On 4+ that enemy Wizard gets a -1 penalty to casting rolls for the rest of the battle. Once the Staff of Spellbinding has been successfully used once it can no longer be used.

name: Scepter of Sovereignty
description: One blunder result from a Command role can be treated as a successful order one time. If a character other than the wearer made the blunder then the player can roll to see the blunder's effects before deciding whether to use the Staff of Sovereignty or not.

name: Scroll of Dispelling
description: One enemy spell automatically fails one time.

name: Wand of Power
description: The wearer gets +1 to cast a spell one time. A roll of 1 still fails. The player must announce that they are using this ability before rolling.

name: Rod of Repetition
description: Once per battle when the wearer rolls high enough to cast a spell (even if the spell is dispelled or anti-magicked by a Runesmith) they may immediately cast another spell. The second spell can be either the same spell or a different one than the first. If a spell itself allows for the possibility of multiple castings (such as Teleport) then that does not affect the Rod of Repetition (so three spells in a row could potentially be cast in this scenario).
